unsigned int  _output_size,
hash< string, Connections * > &  weights_dict,
hash< string, ANNComponent * > &  components_dict 
)
virtual

Abstract method to finish building of component hierarchy and set weights objects pointers. All childs which rewrite this method must call parent method before do anything.

Reimplemented from ANN::ANNComponent.

References ANN::ANNComponent::build().

Token * ANN::SelectANNComponent::doBackprop ( Token *  input_error)
virtual

Virtual method that back-propagates error derivatives and computes other useful stuff. Receives input error gradients, and returns its output error gradients Token.

Reimplemented from ANN::ANNComponent.

References AssignRef, april_utils::string::c_str(), Token::convertTo(), Matrix< T >::copy(), DecRef, dimension, ERROR_EXIT1, error_input, error_output, TokenMatrix< T >::getMatrix(), Token::getTokenCode(), index, input, ANN::ANNComponent::name, output, Matrix< T >::select(), Matrix< T >::setUseCuda(), table_of_token_codes::token_matrix, ANN::ANNComponent::use_cuda, and Matrix< T >::zeros().

Token * ANN::SelectANNComponent::doForward ( Token *  input,
bool  during_training 
)
virtual

Virtual method that executes the set of operations required for each block of connections when performing the forward step of the Backpropagation algorithm, and returns its output Token

Reimplemented from ANN::ANNComponent.

References AssignRef, april_utils::string::c_str(), Matrix< T >::clone(), Token::convertTo(), dimension, ERROR_EXIT1, ERROR_EXIT2, TokenMatrix< T >::getMatrix(), Matrix< T >::getNumDim(), Token::getTokenCode(), index, input, ANN::ANNComponent::name, output, Matrix< T >::select(), Matrix< T >::setUseCuda(), table_of_token_codes::token_matrix, and ANN::ANNComponent::use_cuda.
